body_html:
I am building with:
compile 'org.tensorflow:tensorflow-android:1.2.0'
My app was rejected by Play Store due to having the READ_PHONE_STATE permission and no privacy policy. However I don't have this permission anywhere in my app, and tracked it down to TensorFlow adding it.
Judging by this thread, I am not alone:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44864081/tensorflow-android-library-asking-for-read-phone-state

body:
I am building with:
     compile 'org.tensorflow:tensorflow-android:1.2.0'
My app was rejected by Play Store due to having the READ_PHONE_STATE permission and no privacy policy. However I don't have this permission anywhere in my app, and tracked it down to TensorFlow adding it.
Judging by this thread, I am not alone:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44864081/tensorflow-android-library-asking-for-read-phone-state
